verses.verse: And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Be <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and <S%H4390>replenish<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And the <S%H4172>fear<s%> of you and the <S%H2844>dread<s%> of you shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5775>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>air,<s%> upon <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7430>moveth<s%> upon the <S%H127>earth,<s%> and upon <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> are they <S%H5414>delivered.<s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> moving <S%H7431>thing<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H402>meat<s%> for you; even as the <S%H3418>green<s%> <S%H6212>herb<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> all <S%H3605>things.<s%>
But <S%H389><s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with the <S%H5315>life<s%> thereof, which is the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof, shall ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat.<s%>

And <S%H389>surely<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H5315>lives<s%> will I <S%H1875>require;<s%> at the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> will I <S%H1875>require<s%> it, and at the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H120>man;<s%> at the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> will I <S%H1875>require<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of <S%H120>man.<s%>

Whoso <S%H8210>sheddeth<s%> <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> by <S%H120>man<s%> shall his <S%H1818>blood<s%> be <S%H8210>shed:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in the <S%H6754>image<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853>he<s%> <S%H120>man.<s%>
And <S%H859>you,<s%> be ye <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply;<s%> bring forth <S%H8317>abundantly<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> therein.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
And <S%H589>I,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I <S%H6965>establish<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you, and <S%H854>with<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you;

And <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H854>with<s%> you, of the <S%H5775>fowl,<s%> of the <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you; from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> that go <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you; <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> by the <S%H4480>waters<s%> <S%H4325><s%> of a <S%H3999>flood;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall there any <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H3999>flood<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H226>token<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H854>with<s%> you, for <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> generations: <S%H1755><s%>

I do <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H7198>bow<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> for a <S%H226>token<s%> of a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when I <S%H6049>bring<s%> a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that the <S%H7198>bow<s%> shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> in the cloud: <S%H6051><s%>

And I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H996>between<s%> me and you and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H3999>flood<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

And the <S%H7198>bow<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud;<s%> and I will look <S%H7200>upon<s%> it, that I may <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H226>token<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6965>established<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> that went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> and <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth:<s%> and <S%H2526>Ham<s%> is the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah:<s%> and of <S%H4480>them<s%> <S%H428><s%> was the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H5310>overspread.<s%>
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to be an <S%H376>husbandman,<s%> <S%H127><s%> and he <S%H5193>planted<s%> a vineyard: <S%H3754><s%>
And he <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and was <S%H7937>drunken;<s%> and he was <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> his <S%H168>tent.<s%>

And <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H2351>without.<s%>

And <S%H8035>Shem<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H8071>garment,<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> their <S%H7926>shoulders,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H322>backward,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of their <S%H1>father;<s%> and their <S%H6440>faces<s%> were <S%H322>backward,<s%> and they <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> their <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H3364>awoke<s%> from his <S%H4480>wine,<s%> <S%H3196><s%> and <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> his <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> unto him.
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall he <S%H1961>be<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem;<s%> and <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> his <S%H5650>servant.<s%>

God <S%H430><s%> shall <S%H6601>enlarge<s%> <S%H3315>Japheth,<s%> and he shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem;<s%> and <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> his <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%> and he <S%H4191>died.<s%>
